      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RektKiller
      Enemy that moves either horizontal or vertical and reflects upon colliding.

      As its name says, this Enemy is a rocket.

      class  Warper

    • Uses of Enemy in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon

      Subclasses of Enemy in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cannon
      Enemy that resembles a cannon and periodically tries to shoot the Player with a ray of ...laser? The Cannon itself cannot be killed, however the Player can hide behind Inanimates to escape the laser.

    • Uses of Enemy in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.slurp

      Subclasses of Enemy in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.slurp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Slurp
      This class realizes a simple enemy that will not hurt the Player but slows the player.
